Description:
Deploy birt in Tomcat4 and view attached report but get NullPointerException.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy birt(1123) in Tomcat4.1.31
2. Copy attached design file to Web Viewer Example directory
3. Start tomcat.
4. type http://localhost:8081/birt/frameset?__report=Group_Listing.rptdesign

Actual result:
See attached pic which is captured in Tomcat startup console.

Created an attachment (id=32189)
picture of Tomcat startup console
Check either the report engine or dte.
*** Bug 121992 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I deployed the birt_web which is generated from source code using BuildWebViewer.xml and the report can be executed correctly.

Please verify it with the newest build.
